About Me

A short section dedicated to who I am.

Who am I?

Hi! My name is Liam Haggerty. I am a student at Marist College studying computer science with a minor in cybersecurity. Some of my hobbies include watching movies, boxing, martial arts, hiking, and tinkering with my motorcycle.

I also love anything outdoors and frequently visit Lake Placid, NY in the Adirondaks.
